desc: Teas formulated for rest, resiliency & ritual. Nervous System, Digestive System, Reproductive System, and Immune System teas. Soothes imbalances such as anxiety, stress, overwhelm, insomnia, bloat, gas, acid reflux, constipation, menstrual cramps, PMS, and hormonal imbalances to name a few. Rooted in Ayurveda.

layout.text: Teas Infused with Rest, Ritual, & Resiliency
to bring balance in an anxious world.
